description.narrative: In August 2007, the Millennium Challenge Corporation signed a five-year, $697.5 million compact with the Kingdom of Morocco to reduce poverty and stimulate economic growth through investments in five projects. These strategic investments will increase productivity and improve employment in high potential sectors such as fruit tree productivity, small-scale fisheries, and artisan crafts. Small business creation and economic growth will also be supported by investments in financial services and enterprise support. The compact in Morocco entered into force (EIF) in September 2008, formally initiating the five-year timeline for project implementation.

title.narrative: Morocco Compact Monitoring and Evaluation Plan
Morocco Post-Compact Monitoring and Evaluation Plan

condition.narrative: 1) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Disbursement Request

10) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Fiscal Agent Disbursement Certificate

11) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Procurement Agent Disbursement Certificate

13) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: All applicable conditions precedent in the Schedules to the Program Implementation Agreement, have been duly satisfied, deferred or waived.

14) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: No material default or breach of any covenant, obligation or responsibility by the Government, MCA-Morocco or any Government entity has occurred and is continuing under this Agreement, the Compact or any Supplemental Agreement

15) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: Activities to be funded with MCC Funding being requested by this Disbursement Request will not violate any applicable law or regulation

16) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: The Implementation Plan Documents submitted to MCC are current and updated and are in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, and there has been satisfactory progress on the components of the Implementation Plan for any relevant Projects or Project Activities related to this Disbursement

17) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: Satisfactory progress on the M&E Plan for the Program, relevant Projects or Project activities and substantial compliance with the requirements of the M&E Plan

18) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: There has been no material negative finding in any financial audit report delivered in accordance with the Compact and Audit Plan, for the prior two quarters (or such other period as the Audit Plan .may require)

19) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: Any Taxes paid with MCC Funding (other than Taxes paid in accordance with the Tax Agreement) through the date ninety (90) days prior to the start of the applicable Disbursement Period have been reimbursed by the Government in full in accordance with the Tax Agreement
2) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Narrative Report

20) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: The Government has satisfied all of its payment obligations, including any insurance, indemnification, tax payments or other obligations, and contributed all resources required from it, under the Compact Documents

21) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: MCC does not have grounds for concluding that any matter certified to it in the related MCA Disbursement Certificate, the Fiscal Agent Disbursement Certificate or the Procurement Agent Disbursement Certificate is not as certified

22) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: MCC has not determined, in its sole discretion, that an act, omission, condition, or event has occurred that would be the basis for MCC to suspend or terminate, in whole or in part, MCC Funding in accordance with Section?5.1?of the Compact

23) MCA-Morocco has satisfied, as determined by MCC in its sole discretion, each of the conditions precedent set forth in Section 3.4(b) of the Program Implementation Agreement: Each of the Key Officers remains engaged, or if a position is vacant, MCA-Morocco is actively recruiting for such position to the satisfaction of MCC

24) Each of the conditions precedent set forth on Schedule 2 (Additional Conditions Precedent to Disbursement) to the Program Implementation Agreement to be satisfied prior to entry into force of the Compact shall be met to the satisfaction of MCC

25) Each of the conditions precedent set forth on Schedule 2 (Additional Conditions Precedent to Disbursement) to the Program Implementation Agreement to be satisfied prior to initial Disbursement shall be met to the satisfaction of MCC
26) The Procurement Agent shall have been duly appointed and shall have duly executed the Procurement Agent Agreement and such agreement shall be in full force and effect

27) Prior to the end of the fourth year of the Compact term, a plan must be developed by MCA-Morocco and approved by MCC for the disposition of all proceeds and Program Assets remaining at the end of the Compact term
3) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Quarterly Financial Report
4) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Detailed Financial Plan

5) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Procurement Performance Report
6) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Indicator Tracking Table

7) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Conditions Precedent Report

8) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: Any reports due for this Disbursement Period from any technical (including environmental) auditors engaged by MCA-Morocco for any Project Activity

9) MCA-Morocco shall have delivered each of the documents set forth in Section 3.4(a) of the Program Implementation agreement, each in form and substance acceptable to MCC: MCA Disbursement Certificate
